attributes.action: Asta aviation staffing agency to pay all Primera air crew what they are owed
attributes.background: Primera air has entered liquidation but employees were employed directly by ASTA part of the mountain high group. Asta have terminated all contractors and are with holding salaries owed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the matter you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. 

If you believe the matter has been managed unlawfully, you could approach an Employment Tribunal. You can find out more information about this using the following link:

https://www.gov.uk/courts-tribunals/employment-tribunal
